resources.string: Notifications to remind on the pending tasks
"We don't have required permissions to fetch data from CommCare. Please give app the permissions by going into app settings. "
We need you to grant permission to read the case data from CommCare in order to fetch reminders from CommCare and remind you time to time on your pending tasks.
We need permission to schedule Alarms to be able to remind you of your tasks
Read data from CommCare for fetching reminders from CommCare
Storage permission not granted by user.
Youâ€™re all set! Reminders will be created once you log into your CommCare application
You can also enable the permission from the application setting. Just click on \"Go To Settings\" to open the application setting page.
In case the permission is completely denied, then go to application setting to enable the permission.
